text:
Since version 1.4 of src/generic/weboutint.c web::putx and web::putxfile do not
work properly anymore. Instead of 8-Bit output, these funcs output in a strange
encoding (probably UTF-8).

The workaround for supressing headers when a string starts with "{" that was
added in this version seems not to work properly
creator: ronnie.brunner@netcetera.ch

text: was fixed on 2002-11-26 (patch submitted by D. Welton)
creator: ronnie.brunner@netcetera.ch
